page.title: 04SURVEY OF OCCUPATIONS (1)
page.content: Of the 600 responses to the questionnaire the following is a breakdown of the employment structure of the catchment area. N.B. The survey was restricted to the pupils and parents in the catchment of Framwellgate Moor Comprehensive, Finchale Juniors, Bluecoat and Framwellgate Moor Infants and Juniors. EDUCATION (University, College, Schools and Libraries) 16%, PRISON SERVICE (all grades - Governor to Craft Instructor) 10%, REPAIR TRADES (consumer durables, engineering repairs or auto engineers) 7.8%, HEALTH CARE (social work, hospital, GP's, dentists, auxiliaries) 5.8%, SALES REPS AND RETAIL TRADES (all grades) 5.8%, CIVIL SERVICE 5.7%, MANUFACTURING (all levels,management to shopfloor) 5.7%, LOCAL GOVERNMENT (all grades) 5%.
